sentences.sContent: There were hardly any black coats or round hats now, but smock frocks, blouses, caps, and bristling and cadaverous heads.
sentences.sContent_eng: There were hardly any black coats or round hats now, but smock frocks, blouses, caps, and bristling and cadaverous heads.
sentences.sCn: 里面几乎没有穿黑衣服戴圆边帽的人。是些穿罩衫、布褂、戴鸭舌帽、头发蓬乱竖立、面如土色的人。

synos.tran: 毛发竖立；发怒；被布满（bristle的ing形式）
